text: Can you share the approach you are following?

There are a few ways to implement webhooks on HubSpot:


Webhooks API (Free and Up)

Workflow Extensions (Professional and up)

Webhook action via bots/workflows (Operations Hub Professional only)

Attached article provides more information on each method.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/blog/implementing-webhooks-in-HubSpot#:~:text=How%20to%20implement%20webhooks%20in%20HubSpot>

I can also see that Xero has built an integration with HubSpot that is available on the Asset Marketplace here. The integration was built to send Xero contact data into your HubSpot account. This integration may be of interest to you.

If you have any follow-up questions or would like further clarification, please don’t hesitate to reach back out to me. I’m more than happy to help.
